caption:
“Poverty is not lack, but liberty.”

Reflection:
To own nothing is to be owned by nothing. Simplicity frees the soul to love without weight.

Commentary:
This line reframes poverty as spiritual freedom — detachment from possessions, ambition, and fear. True wealth is found in contentment.

#VeniFaithful #VeniPublishing #RuleOfLife #MonasticLife #OrthodoxChristian #LectioDivina #SilenceAndSolitude #ChristianInspiration #FaithOverFear
